description:
Palm Hot Apps Winner and Bright Hub's Top Business App! BillMyTime is a full-featured app for managing your billable hours and expenses.

Main Features:
- Generate fees and expenses
- Store all your client information
- Import clients using Google Docs
- Create categories for easy billing
- Time billable tasks
- Input timesheets
- Generate customized reports
- Export reports directly to Google Docs, or as an e-mail in a table or CSV format

Limitations:
This demonstration version allows you to evaluate all the features of BillMyTime with the following exceptions:
- You can store only three clients
- You cannot export any transactions

More Information:
Visit superfluinc.com for more screenshots and information. Please contact us with questions or feedback. BillMyTime is available in English & French.
